question: Which Indian Academy received the Presidentâ€™s Colour award-2019?
explanation: President Ram Nath Kovind awarded the President\'s Colour to Indian Naval Academy at Ezhimala, Kerala, on 20 November,2019. The award recognizes the yeoman service that was rendered by the institution in training and shaping Indian Naval officers over the last fifty years at three different locations, namely Kochi, Goa, and Ezhimala.
